L2_gloss:
woman
Qwetséts re núxwenxw.[4] - The woman left.

father
Xwexwéyt re swet xwistés newí7s re qé7tses.[4]
Everyone likes their own father.

(intransitive) to leave, to depart
Tsut m qwetséts newí7s.[3]
He said that he (the speaker) left.

man (male person)
Yirí7 te sqélemcw l wíwktsems.[4] - That is the man who saw me.

house
re tsitcws - his/her/their house
wíst te tsitcw[2] - a high house
Wíst re tsitcw.[2] - The house is high.

all
Xwexwéyt re swet xwistés newí7s re qé7tses.[2]
Everyone likes their own father.
